Module org.monarchinitiative.phenol.core
Package org.monarchinitiative.phenol.ontology.scoredist

Class ObjectScoreDistribution

java.lang.Object
org.monarchinitiative.phenol.ontology.scoredist.ObjectScoreDistribution
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public final class ObjectScoreDistribution extends Object implements Serializable
Precomputed score distribution for a fixed number of terms and one world object Ids.
Author:
Manuel Holtgrewe, Sebastian Koehler

  • Constructor Details

    • ObjectScoreDistribution

      public ObjectScoreDistribution(TermId objectId, int numTerms, int sampleSize, SortedMap<Double,Double> cumulativeFrequencies)
      Construct score distribution for a given number of terms, sample size, and cumulative frequencies.
      Parameters:
      objectId - "World object" identifier.
      numTerms - Number of terms used in precomputation.
      sampleSize - Sample size used for precomputation.
      cumulativeFrequencies - Cumulative frequencies of the scores.
